name: Wireless Headphones
description: High-quality sound and deep bass with noise-canceling technology. Long-lasting battery, up to 30 hours playback. Comfortable design, perfect for travel, work, or leisure with Bluetooth connectivity.

name: Smartphone
description: 5G smartphone with OLED display, powerful processor, and triple-camera system. 128GB storage, fast-charging battery, sleek design, and water-resistant. Ideal for multitasking and high-quality photography.

name: Gaming Laptop
description: High-performance gaming laptop with powerful processor and graphics card. Features a full HD display, advanced cooling, and customizable RGB backlighting. Ideal for gamers and professionals.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with crystal-clear sound and powerful bass. Waterproof and shockproof. 20-hour battery life. Ideal for outdoor adventures or indoor use with quick Bluetooth pairing.

name: 4K Monitor
description: 27-inch 4K UHD monitor with HDR support. Provides stunning visuals for gaming, design, or movies. Slim design, adjustable stand, and multiple connectivity options for various devices.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: Smart fitness tracker monitoring heart rate, steps, and sleep. Water-resistant design. Syncs with smartphone for notifications. Long battery life up to one week. Comfortable for all-day wear.

name: Smartwatch
description: Stylish smartwatch with fitness tracking features. Monitors heart rate, sleep, and steps. Water-resistant, connects to smartphone for notifications. Customizable watch face, long battery life.

name: Mechanical Keyboard
description: Premium mechanical keyboard with tactile keys and customizable RGB backlighting. Durable switches, programmable keys, ergonomic design. Ideal for gaming and professional typing. Compatible with Windows and Mac.

name: Wireless Earbuds
description: Wireless earbuds with crystal-clear sound and active noise cancellation. Sweat-resistant, comes with portable charging case. Bluetooth 5.0 technology for seamless connectivity. Comfortable fit for all-day use.

name: Portable Charger
description: High-capacity portable charger with multiple USB ports. Compact, lightweight, fast-charging output. Ideal for travel. Protects against overcharging and short circuits. LED indicator for battery life.

name: Laptop Stand
description: Adjustable laptop stand for ergonomic use. Elevates laptop to eye level, reducing neck strain. Foldable and portable. Made from durable materials. Ideal for home or office use.

name: USB Hub
description: Compact USB hub with multiple ports. Expands your deviceâ€™s connectivity. Supports high-speed data transfer. Plug-and-play design, compatible with most devices. Ideal for expanding USB capabilities.

name: Smart Thermostat
description: Energy-efficient smart thermostat with Wi-Fi connectivity. Control temperature remotely via app. Learn your preferences to optimize heating and cooling. Easy installation and compatible with most systems.

name: Noise-Canceling Earphones
description: Noise-canceling earphones with premium sound quality. Comfortable fit for long listening sessions. Built-in mic for calls. Long battery life and easy Bluetooth pairing for seamless use.

name: Gaming Mouse
description: Ergonomic gaming mouse with customizable buttons and RGB lighting. High-precision sensor for accurate tracking. Adjustable DPI settings. Comfortable design for long gaming sessions.

name: External Hard Drive
description: High-capacity external hard drive with fast transfer speeds. Portable and durable design. Ideal for backing up files and expanding storage. Compatible with both Windows and Mac systems.

name: Smart Light Bulb
description: Smart light bulb with adjustable brightness and color. Controlled via app or voice assistant. Energy-efficient LED technology. Easy to install and compatible with smart home systems.

name: VR Headset
description: Virtual reality headset with immersive 3D experience. High-resolution display and adjustable straps. Compatible with various VR games and applications. Lightweight and comfortable for extended use.

name: Smart Home Hub
description: Central hub for controlling smart home devices. Supports multiple protocols and integrations. Easy setup and management via app. Compatible with various smart home products for streamlined control.

name: Wireless Charger
description: Convenient wireless charger for Qi-compatible devices. Fast charging with sleek, compact design. Non-slip surface and built-in safety features. Ideal for home or office use.

name: Smart Plug
description: Smart plug with remote control via app. Monitor and control appliances from anywhere. Works with voice assistants. Easy to set up, compact design, and energy monitoring features.

name: Keyboard Case
description: Protective keyboard case with built-in Bluetooth keyboard. Compatible with tablets and e-readers. Durable material, adjustable angles for comfortable typing. Ideal for on-the-go productivity.

name: Power Bank
description: Compact power bank with high capacity. Multiple USB ports for charging devices. Fast charging technology and LED indicator for battery life. Ideal for travel and daily use.

name: Tablet Stand
description: Adjustable tablet stand for hands-free use. Durable and portable with multiple angles. Perfect for watching videos, reading, or video calls. Compatible with various tablet sizes.

name: Car Phone Mount
description: Adjustable car phone mount with secure grip. Easy installation on dashboard or windshield. 360-degree rotation for optimal viewing angles. Keeps phone accessible and visible while driving.

name: Cable Organizer
description: Neat cable organizer to keep cords and cables tidy. Compact design with multiple slots for different cables. Ideal for home or travel use. Prevents tangling and damage to cables.

name: Portable Air Purifier
description: Compact portable air purifier with HEPA filter. Removes allergens, dust, and odors. Ideal for use in small spaces like offices or cars. Quiet operation and easy to use.

name: Smart Doorbell
description: Smart doorbell with HD video and two-way audio. Connects to smartphone for remote viewing and communication. Motion detection and night vision features. Easy installation and setup.

name: Fitness Smartband
description: Smartband with fitness tracking features. Monitors steps, heart rate, and sleep. Water-resistant with long battery life. Syncs with smartphone for notifications and health insights.

name: Smart Ring
description: Elegant smart ring with fitness tracking and notifications. Tracks activity, heart rate, and sleep. Compatible with smartphone apps. Stylish design and long battery life.

name: Smart Glasses
description: Innovative smart glasses with built-in display. Augmented reality features for immersive experiences. Voice commands and touch controls. Lightweight and comfortable for all-day wear.

name: Action Camera
description: Compact action camera with 4K video recording. Waterproof and durable for extreme conditions. Features wide-angle lens and built-in stabilization. Ideal for adventure and sports enthusiasts.

name: Digital Camera
description: High-resolution digital camera with advanced features. Includes zoom lens and image stabilization. Ideal for photography enthusiasts. Easy-to-use controls and high-quality image capture.

name: Electric Kettle
description: Electric kettle with rapid boiling technology. Auto shut-off and boil-dry protection. Sleek design with easy-to-read water level indicator. Ideal for making tea, coffee, or instant meals.

name: Blender
description: High-power blender with multiple speed settings. Perfect for smoothies, soups, and sauces. Durable stainless steel blades and easy-to-clean design. Includes measuring cup and recipe book.

name: Coffee Maker
description: Programmable coffee maker with large capacity. Brew strength control and auto-off feature. Includes reusable filter and warming plate. Easy to use and maintain for a perfect cup every time.

name: Air Fryer
description: Compact air fryer with adjustable temperature settings. Cooks food with less oil, providing crispy results. Includes detachable basket for easy cleaning. Ideal for healthy cooking.

name: Vacuum Cleaner
description: Powerful vacuum cleaner with multiple attachments. Features HEPA filter and adjustable suction settings. Ideal for carpets, hardwood floors, and upholstery. Compact design for easy storage.

name: Toaster
description: Four-slice toaster with adjustable browning control. Includes defrost and reheat functions. Compact design with crumb tray for easy cleanup. Ideal for making breakfast quickly and conveniently.

name: Microwave Oven
description: Compact microwave oven with multiple power levels. Defrost and reheat functions with easy-to-use controls. Includes turntable for even cooking. Ideal for quick meal preparation.
